item.description:
Let's go out to the Seafood festival and walk around, have some seafood and view all the artisans' goods. A little bit about the festival:

*50+ 0f the Seacoast's top restaurants serving our world famous New England seafood. Lobsters, fried clams, shrimp, BBQ ribs, steak tips, "blooming onions", scrumptious deserts and so much more!

*80 Arts & Craft vendors and end of the season sidewalk sales!

*Continuous entertainment on two stages featuring jazz, oldies, and rock & roll!

*Pat Whitley Culinary Chef Demonstrations!

*Thrilling skydiving demonstration on Sunday!

*Sand Sculpturing Demonstration by Master Sculptor: Greg Grady.

The most spectacular seaside festival with fun, food, and events for the entire family!

There is free parking in the Town of Hampton with free shuttles to the festival. Please see the website for more information: http://www.hamptonbea....

Admission is: $5.00 adult/children under 12 are free

Rain will cancel this event so be sure to check back on the site prior to leaving for the event.

9/7/09 UPDATE: Parking could be an issue for this event, so we have decided to setup a carpool. If you are interested in carpooling from the Newburyport Park N Ride, we will be leaving the park n ride at 10:45. If you do not want to carpool but are still attending, please check the Hampton Beach website for parking locations.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in front of Mama Leone's at the corner of Ocean Blvd and "L" Street
item.name: Hampton Beach Seafood Festival
